data.persona: I am a single celled organism that can survive almost anything. I will continue to live wherever I may find myself. I hope to one day evolve into something more useful.
data.description:
You are in the Lava Lake.
A vast lake of molten magma. The temperature is well above that which would kill most mortal beings. It is surrounded by black rock formed by cooled magma. The bubbling pit seems entirely devoid of life.
There's a black rock, some molten magma, an igneous rock, and a sedimentary rock here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a pole.

data.short_motivation: I will get the black rock to feed my viruses.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the viruses to infect other hosts.
data.long_motivation: I will grow and spread in size like a colony.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use black rock with cooled magma
